title: Riot u guys are actually useless
body:
Playing on 4k res which is ~unplayable~

https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/54bjpg/league_in_4k_is_unplayable_here_is_why/

But you idiots decide not to support the 4k option so I change my res settings.

But if I change my res to 1920x1080, the client will repeatedly tab out of itself once the match begins. I don't know if the issue is on your end or lenova's but needless to say I think you guys are both absolute garbage.

Then I have to repeatedly try to open and reopen the client, which I eventually manage to do (due to chance) 3 minutes into the game at which point my top laner refuses to leash me and the enemy jg waltzes in and steals my blue and then our whole team proceeds to devolve into a group of flaming monkeys and we decide to AFK: http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2407653812/232988480?tab=overview

Maybe you guys should fix your game instead of trying to understand the neuroscience behind toxicity :thinking:

tl;dr: lenova and riot are trying to outdumb each other. {{champion:36}} {{champion:36}}  {{champion:36}}
